<0>Sur un site dédié handicap tel que Ha:
<0>On a job board dedicated to handicap, as Hanploi.com, you don't have to note it. There, recruiters are foremost looking for skills with the RQTH specificity.

Specify your accomodations not on the CV, but on the decidated section on the job board, or in a separted document.
<p>Un recruteur averti vous posera la qu:
A forewarned recruiter will ask the question: "can you benefit from the law of 2005 or do you have an RQTH?"

The question "do you require any workstation adjustments?" will follow.

If this question doesn't come up, you have the right not to talk about it.
<strong>Expérimenté·e</strong>, vous pou: Experienced, you can share with the team the skills you have acquired previously.
<strong>Opérationnel·le</strong>, vous s: Operational, you will be an asset for the team from day 1 as you know your job.
<strong>Stable</strong>, vous en serez d: Stable, you will be all the more reliable.
Accédez à la liste des auto-écoles agréé: See the list of driving schools certified for the 1€ driving license {{inDepartment}}
Attaquez-vous à la première étape du per: Start the first step of the driving license: study for the theory test online.
Aujourd'hui, l'alternance est ouverte pa: Today, "alternance" contracts are not only for young people, but to anybody registered at Pôle emploi or welfare beneficiaries.
Avec une alternance, vous me formerez pr: With an "alternance", you would train me to the exact work process and to the specific skills for the job. I would be useful faster than if I had to adapt from another job. I've already selected trainings that seems to match but if you can recommend some trainings… My priority is to join your company.
C'est une fois que l'on a obtenu un entr: It is only after obtaining an interview with an employer that you can know exactly the kind of training that you'll need and in which city. Start by finding a company, rather than a training center, that will increase your chances of success.
C'est à vous de décider si vous voulez p:
It's up to you to decide whether you want to mention your handicap on your CV. It's a personal choice that is yours to make. Yet, according to Hanploi: <1>

Don't specificy it, you would increase your chances to get an interview. And you'll always have the time to talk about it in person with the recruiter. It's your choice, but only if you feel like it and if you require a specific accomodation.

Otherwise, noone is forcing you to mention it. If the company has a "mission handicap", you will be able to mention it later, once your trial period has been validated.
It's up to you to decide whether you want to mention your handicap on your CV. Thinking about how the targeted employer would receive it is a good method to help you choose.

Chère Madame, cher Monsieur,\n\n\n\nJ'ai:
Dear Madam, dear Sir,



I started building a professional project to be a .....

I saw that I had the possibility to do an immersion internship (PMSMP), and I'm convinced that it would help me validate my project. I have three objectives:

1. try that job to confirm my motivation
2. obtain a recent experience on my resume to help me apply for this kind of job
3. get a first contact in the sector

Could we meet to talk about it please?
Would you be available this week?
Thanks.

Sincerely,

{{name}}
Ciblez précisément les bonnes entreprise: Target specifically the right companies to apply to

En tant que travailleur handicapé, il n': As a handicap worker, there is no age limit to do an "alternance". 53%* of people in a situation close to yours have transformed their "professionnalisation" contract into a long-term contract.<1>AGEFIPH 2017</1>
Essayez de trouver un contact à l'intéri: Try to contact someone inside the company

Flexible, vous savez gérer des imprévus: Flexible, you can handle unpexected situations and you'll be able to adapt to a new company's culture.
Grâce au dispositif \"permis à 1€ par jo:
Thanks to the "1€ per day driving licence" program that the State set up, you can request a loan from bank for an amount of 600, 800, 1,000, or 1,200€ to pay for your driving license (depending on the price of the driving school). The loan's interets are paid by the State.

On your side, you will need to repay 30€ per month.
Hanploi nous conseille :<1><p>Qui vous c:
Hanploi recommends:<1>

Who knows you better than yourself? So you should be able to talk about yourself! No need to beat around the bush if you need a workstation adjustment.

But do not go into the details of your handicap, it's your personal concenr!

Ask yourself the right questions about the job you are targeting.

There are more offers per candidate in <1>{{jobGroupName}}</1> in these <3></3> départements {{thanInDepartementText}}
Il y a plusieurs avantages pour l'entrep: There are several benefits for the company to recruit in "lternance". For instance, for an "apprentissage" contract, the employer does not pay any social contribution. The company can also benefit from a 1000 euros minimum bonus as well as tax credits.
Introverti·e, intuitif·ve, extraverti·e,: Introvert, intuitive, extravert, observer, strategist, curious, enthusiastic or toughtful… Knowing yourself better will help you orient your search. Bonus: the results of the tests will help you to present your strengths and weaknesses during an interview.

L'<1>AGEFIPH</1> et ou le <3>FIPHP</3> p: The <1>AGEFIPH</1> and/or the <3>FIPHP</3> might take in charge part or all the costs of your arrangement. Remember to tell your future employer.
L'immersion professionnelle est un cadre: The professional immersion is a framework that allows you to do <1>a mini-internsip</1> in a company to discover what a job is about. The internship can last <3>between a few hours and 2 weeks</3>. During the immersion you are not paid but you are covered for any accident and you are coached by a tutor. His or her role is both to guide you in the company and help you assess your skills.
La Mission Locale vous aidera à mettre e: The Mission Locale will help you for the setup of the immersion. (They also might have some contacts in companies that could host you <1>😉</1>).
Le réseau, c'est le meilleur canal d'opp: Your network is best channel to find opportunities. It is through people you know that you'll learn about people or companies that are hiring people like you. So go all the way!
Maximiser l'impact de vos candidatures: Maximize the impact of your applications
Me renseigner sur ce programme de stages: Learn more about this internships program on <1>pole-emploi.fr</1>
Mettre la mention <strong>RQTH</strong>: Add the RQTH on your CV in the "profile" section.
N'ayez pas peur du mot. \"Faire du résea: Don't be afraid of the word. "Networking", is simply silly: telling your friends what you are looking for, meeting people. The world is a small place and you should take advantage of it.

Assistant to the Sales Director?

Selon Hanploi,<1><p>Par expérience, il e:
According to Hanploi,<1>

From experience, it's better to talk about your handicap before signing your work contract.

Today you might not need any workstation adjustments, but what about tomorrow?
Selon Hanploi :<1><p>Une intégration réu:
According to Hanploi:<1>

A good integration is key to successfully complete your probation period.

By defining your needs more precisely, your future employer will be able to prepare your integration in his/her team.

Without disclosing your handicap, he/she can explain your break, your workstation adjustments or any specific pieces of furniture made available to you.

Thus your colleagues will understand.
Si ce sont vos parents qui empruntent po:
If your parents are borrowing in your name, you can tell them that:
<2><0>The "1€ per day driving license" was setup by the State, as a partnership with some banks and driving schools.<1>It allows you to get a loan from a bank for an amout of 600, 800, 1,000 or 1,200€ to pay for your driving license. The interests of the loan are paid by the state and you need to pay back 30€ per month.
Si vos parents ne peuvent pas vous aider: If your parents cannot help you, you can contact your Mission Locale that might be able to help you (caution, it's not 100% certain, even if you meet all the criteria)
Si vous remplissez ces conditions de bas: If you meet those requirements, you should contact your Pôle emploi counselor to start the process.
